Question: This person won a male record 109 singles titles.
Hints: In October 2005, this person had successful hip-replacement surgery at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles.
This person won more matches (1,337) than any other male professional tennis player in the open era.
Head to head in major championship finals, this person took both meetings, winning the 1982 and 1983 US Open.
